oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Arthur St. Clair Colyar
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Portrait photograph of Arthur St. Clair Colyar (1818-1907).
Author of "Life and Times of Andrew Jackson," prominent attorney in Nashville, member of the Confederate Congress, President of Tennessee Coal & Iron Co., served in the Tennessee House, 1877-1879.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Calvert Brothers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Colyar, A. S. (Arthur St. Clair), 1818-1907
Authors; Lawyers; Legislators; Business people
